dialogue.text:
Hey adventurer! Keep it a secret, ok? We are currently manufacturing the so-called #b#t2049100##k, under Just-in-time marketing strategy. You needed? We're here. So, we act in two fronts: talk to me if you want a good bunch of these. It will be a #bQuest#k-esque procediment, however I will need plenty of #bhard-to-get gadgets#k from you. I will require a #r3 days#k break after the completion to start working for you again.
Talk to my partner here, and he will JIT #bsynthetize#k these scrolls for you, requiring a bunch of #blow-cost items#k, #ranytime anywhere#k.
